111.content:
"Ikku-kun..."

You breathe in deeply as you stare at the woman in front of you in awe. Her beautiful dark purple hair that's braided together to her side, blowing nicely in the sea breeze that surrounds you and her. Like the blue glistening water that you can hear crashing against the rocks away from you, her eyes are a mesmerizing purple that seems to draw you in like the ocean. Everything from her youthful complexion to her amazing hips and chest screams the word "love".

This woman...is your mother: Furuta Mihoko  . As for you, your name is Furata Ikku, a Japanese high school student who had just turned 18.

You are ashamed to forget what you were saying to her before. Just seeing her in her golden and flowery bikini is enough for you to lose your train of thought, but everything around you such as the sun and glowing ocean at the resort you are relaxing at with her seems to make her shine even more so.

"Ikku-kun..." Mihoko says again, her expression beaming at her only son who she can't be any more proud of. To her son's confusion, he has no idea why she looks so happy and her following words only make him more confused as he tries to remember what he said earlier to her, just moments ago.

"...does this mean...you want mommy as your girlfriend?"

Ikku froze, now wondering what could have caused that conclusion. Actually, let's step back farther before coming to this resort of love. When did you get such an opportunity to spend time at this wonderful location and mother?
111.title: Beautiful Japanese Mother By The Beach

1111.content:
"Mom!"

Entering the hospital room where your mother, Mihoko lied, you got a call from a doctor that she had finally awoken from her coma. After being hit by a falling rusty stop sign while walking leisurely back home with groceries in her hand, it her at the right angle for her to lose consciousness. Luckily, someone was in the area to call the ambulance.

Your father died when you were young, so your mother was your only family. You were naturally close and she raised you well to study hard. Her efforts paid off when you heard that you got accepted into a major university overseas in the U.S.. Although it pained you to leave your mother alone, you knew that you wanted to pay her back for all the love and effort she made in raising you and that meant getting a job to support you and her.

Her accident was unexpected though and for a week, you were a terrible mess, hoping and crying out for your mother to open her eyes. You had gone through nearly a quarter of your savings from various part time jobs just to help treat her for injuries and support her stay at the hospital. Thankfully, her coma wasn't long relative to other people and she made a quick recovery.

With three quarters of your savings left, it was just barely enough to support your plan to go on a trip to a resort with your mother as a farewell gift before you enter college. There, you wouldn't have to worry too much about money as your stay and school was paid for by scholarship; however, there was still an unexpected wrench to be thrown in that plan as well as the resort plan as you would find out.

"...Your mother has a severe case of Amnesia, I'm afraid."

"Huh?"

Mihoko lied upright in the patient bed, deeply ashamed and dared not to look at anyone in the face. There was confusion and fear written all over her face. It was a horrible sight to see and you couldn't imagine how conflicted she must feel to want to know who she is, but unable to.

The more you stare at your mother, the more you realize the doctor's words in front of you is no joke. With the man's serious expression, you find yourself with your mouth open and at a loss.

Closing your eyes and breathing deeply, you regain your composure. Ultimately, your mother has woken up within a week of being in a coma. Amnesia, however severe, is a small price to pay just to see the woman who raised you lively again.

Opening your eyes, you don't stare at your mother anymore and focus your attention to the doctor. Lowering your voice, you speak openly.

"So...how long will this last?"

The doctor had a difficult expression as he turned around to gaze at the mother. "Could be weeks...months...but the important thing is that she needs to be near you and wherever she travels the most often. That is the best way to jog her memory and slowly recover; however, it may still end up incomplete for her. We measure how bad amnesia is based on what was lost. Your mother...she can barely remember her own childhood."

"Oh man..."

The doctor focuses back to you and gives a reassuring smile now, deciding to end the solemn and depressing environment. He pats your shoulder. "For now, you need to come here as often as you can. We can't release her yet since we need to make sure there's no lag in her motor function, but if all is well and we don't find any problems physically, we'll release her and then it's up to you to continue her care."

You nod and the doctor pats your shoulder again. "You're a good boy, you know? If there's anything I've seen in my years of experience, a mother's instinct goes far beyond memory and she'll remember you quicker than anything else. Just be patient with her, okay?"

"Right. Thank you doctor....I....really can't thank you enough."

The doctor chuckles. "Well, I'll be on my way. If you want to stay overnight, let a nurse know and we'll make accomodations for you both."

With that, the doctor leaves the room and shuts the door behind him to give privacy to the mother and son. There was an awkard silence between both of you before Mihoko finally looks your way and speaks up.

"I'm...sorry. I understand that you're my son, but..."

You smile warmly. "Hey, it's no problem. Don't try too hard, mom. You just woke up today so there isn't a chance you'll remember so quickly."

Mihoko furrows her eyebrows. "This is just so unbearable for me though. I feel so lost and I just...I feel like I'm falling without anything to grab onto."

Her eyes get misty and you truly feel saddened to see her in this state. She has always been so cheery and positive, so to see her like this makes your heart twist. Quickly moving to her side, you surprise her by hugging her.

"Mom...I'm here, so please, don't cry. If you need to grab onto something, grab onto me, okay?"

Mihoko sniffles and then buries her head into your shoulder. She wraps her arms around your back and hums. "Thank you."

Pulling back after a few seconds, Mihoko starts to smile a little. "It's strange...I don't feel weird hugging you at all. You really are my son...but you're more mature than I expected you to be."

You chuckle, sitting in a chair beside her bed. "Well, that's how you raised me to be, but I'll be honest, I'm not very mature around you."

Your mother cocks her head, confused. "What do you mean?"

You feel embarrassed exposing yourself, but this is your mother and you feel that you need to be open and honest if you are to jog your mother's memories.

"Well...for one, I guess I'm really spoiled around you in some regards. I've...always called you mommy when we're alone. Not only that, we frequently hug and since we're the only two together at home, you're the person I most talk to."

Mihoko doesn't show any sign of disgust or embarrassment. Rather, she smiles more warmly now as she clasps her hands. "That's...actually wonderful. I'm glad that we're so close together. Would you mind calling me that again?"

You raise an eyebrow. "Um...what again?"

"Mommy," she clarifies.

You grow a little red, but force yourself to stand strong and not crumble. "Mommy."

Mihoko can't help but sigh and feel at ease. "Thank you. So please...can you tell me more about yourself?"

From then, you told her everything about yourself and herself from her own history that she knew. Time flew and within three days, Mihoko was released from the hospital after determining she is able to stand and walk on her own. She had at least regained 80% of her strength and the rest would be recovered by performing her usual activities.

You took advice from the doctor who told you not to give any special treatment to your mother and act like you had always around her. That was easier said than done since she gets surprised quicker, but you hugged her as much as you could around the house and gave her kisse son on the cheek.

There was some progress at home as she recalled her grandfather and mother, but there was still missing pieces here and there. As for her memory of you, the most important memory of giving birth to you was remembered after watching a video that showed your deceased father. She teared up and within that night, some differences had started to appear. She started to want to sleep with you in the same bed and hold you tightly. In addition, she also started to refer herself as mommy.

Yet, you weren't going to discourage her. It was too early and you didn't want her recovery to lose momentum. As such, you bared with it and after two weeks of time together, you decide that you needed to get out of the house and take your mother on the long awaited resort vacation you had planned.

How does the trip to the resort start?
1111.title: One Month Ago: Mihoko's Amnesia.

choices: Mihoko grows jealous as she sees her son sneaking looks at some girls.

11111.content:
"Ikku-kun..." she breathed as she stared at the blue ocean, "...this is so beautiful."

Having just left for the planned trip to a private resort located in the Pacific, part of the vacation was a two-day cruise to the island. After arriving there, the plan was to stay there two weeks before you'd have to leave home. You had saved for a long time to make this trip happened and even though you had your mother's unexpected medical expenses, you had enough to still go.

Of course, you wished you had your mother fully recovered, but with the prices so low, you knew that there wouldn't be a better time to go without continuing your part-time job. Plus, you didn't have much time before you had to leave for college. As much as it pained you to leave your mother, especially when her memory hasn't recovered, you'd lose your scholarship if you skipped your enrollment this year.

As a result, you wanted to at least create new memories for your mother to live by and hope she would recover without your presence. In your mind, as you worried about the future, you try to calm yourself knowing that there are ways through technology to reach your loved ones.

'It's going to be all okay,' you think.

Your mother was wearing a blue flower dress and a nice sun hat as the sea breeze flowing through her lush hair. You would never expect that in the near future, a similar scene would play out and your entire relationship with your mother would change.

That said, currently to your knowledge, she was still your mother and you didn't try to think beyond that, even given with her exceptional complexion and beauty. Many onboard passengers thought she was your girlfriend, much to your embarrassment. Luckily, nobody had approached you or your mother, leaving you and her to enjoy yourself.

Standing beside her, you touch her shoulder and she leans against yours, humming pleasantly. "I still can't believe you had saved up for me. Still, I don't feel that this is right. You should be doing this with your hundred percent complete mother, not me who cannot even remember her own history."

You chuckle at your mother's silly logic. "You are hundred percent complete, mom. As long as you watch your step next time, I hope you remember this moment along with your past memories."

"Ah...I'm not confident about that, Ikku-kun. You'll have to protect me next time if something falls on me," she winks and sticks out her tongue cutely.

You smile and compared to two weeks ago, you're happy that your mother is so expressive. In fact, she's more expressive than before her memory loss and it may be that she feels younger since she remembers less. Whatever the reason, you are relieved to see her in great spirits. Thanks to that, you've been able to loosen up yourself and be a little less sensitive around her.

"Who knows though? Maybe next time it'll jog your memory?" you grin.

Mihoko widens her eyes, standing straight this time and she pouts. "That's not very nice, Ikku-kun. I thought I raised you to be a kind and loving son?"

You raise an eyebrow, amused. Inside though, you are screaming how cute your mother is being. "Does that mean you remember?"

Mihoko froze and then stares down embarrassed. "I uh...I remember raising you in my arms as a baby. Does that count?"

You chuckle and lean forward to kiss your mother on her forehead. She grows timid but happy at her son spoiling her. She giggles, and not satisfied with the small kiss, moves to hug you tightly.

You half-expect your mother to hug you at any moment since she grew more comfortable around you, so you don't resist and her back, closing your eyes and humming. Truth be told, you expect her to grow a little more distant when she regained her memories. Right now, she's far too attached to you than ever before like a child but decided not to place such expectations on her.

As her only support, you knew that you had to be with her with ever phase as she recovers. As such, even if it embarrassed you, showing your love for her as a son was the best you can do, even if it meant that you had to spoil her more.

Finally letting go as you watch the ocean tides for a while, it was time for lunch, so you and your mother head out to the onboard buffet to eat your heart out. What happens next?

111112.content:
You ate happily at the all-you-can-eat buffet. As part of the travel price, you knew you wanted to get your money's worth, so it would be a waste not to indulge. As you ate, you took pictures of your mother and she happily posed for all of them, smiling so beautifully for every single shot.

The sight of your mother, even before her accident, would always make you feel tingly inside your stomach, but now, her smile comes so innocently and beautiful that it makes your heart beat. Quickly, you admonished yourself for thinking incorrect thoughts to your mother as you washed your hands in the nearby restroom.

'This is only temporary...' you remind yourself, 'She'll eventually mellow out as she regains more of her memories.'
.
Drying your hands and exiting, you see your mother awaiting you at the exit with a deep blush and lazy eyes. In her hands was a cocktail with a tiny umbrella inside. She was swaying a little causing some of the alcohol to spill out of the glass.

'Oh shit. She didn't...'

"Ikku-kun~ Let's have more fun, yeah!"

You pinch the bridge of your nose and sigh. You didn't expect your mother to grab a cocktail while you performed business in the restroom. Of course, Mihoko probably didn't know any better given her lack of memories, but she's actually no good in alcohol. You couldn't blame her because if she did know, she would have abstained, yet it seemed curiosity got the better of her.

Closing in on your mother to help support her, Mihoko giggles uncontrollably and moves as well to hug you, swaying left and right. She drops her glass and you widen your eyes, moving more swiftly and extending your arm just in time to grab the cocktail glass by its stem. Breathing a sigh of relief, you fail to realize that your mother was drawing close without a care in the world and promptly, your face is smooshed between her lovely chest while you were leaning forward in order to save her glass.

"Oh Ikku-kun...I loooove you~" she drawls, giggling and tightly wrapping her arms around your head, burying deeper. With the cocktail in your glass, you didn't care anymore that you were spilling the drink as you waved your arms frantically, unable to breathe under your mother's tight hold.

"M-mom, I...I can't breathe!" you exclaimed muffled, squirming your head around her huge chest which jiggles uncontrollably. All the men, particularly in trunks, popped a boner as they saw the scene and there were many girls who couldn't help but stare at their husband or boyfriend in dismay.

Finally pulling away, Mihoko lets out a disappointed moan. She frowns, her eyes still so lazily glaring at her son. "That's not nice, Ikku-kun. Mommy only wants a hug!"

You gasp in deeply and stare at her incredulously. Trying to keep yourself composed and fighting hard not to stare at her huge chest that you were just immersed in, you stare at your mother in the eye and place your hands on her shoulder.

"Okay mom, you're drunk. Let's head back to our cabin, okay?"

Mihoko eyes widen. "Eh? I don't want to! Also, you promised to call me mommy!"

You quickly hush her and look around, seeing others stare at you which makes you even more uncomfortable. Laughing it off and realize that Mihoko was being a little too loud, you apologized.

"Ahaha...Sorry about that, we'll be on our way!"

Pushing your mother forward, she resists and shakes her head vehemently. "No, I want to spend more time outside with Ikku-kun!"

Argh!

You surprise her as you turn around, lower yourself, and grab her thighs. She lets out a yelp as you raise yourself and force her to cling to your back. Being forced to give your drunk mother a piggyback seeing how she's not willing to move on her own, you leave urgently, wanting to avoid as much public eye as you can. It's embarrassing enough that you have to carry your mother on your back, but you desperately wanted to leave the buffet and the top deck as soon as you can.

Meanwhile, Mihoko finds that she enjoys your broad back and the warmth, giggling and now securing herself around your neck. "Ikku-kun, you are so warm..."

You blush and as much as you didn't want to think about it, your mother's huge chest is squishing blissfully against you. Her thighs are in your hands and incredibly squishy as well. Gulping, you focus on the path towards your cabin, ignoring passerbyers looks seeing a young man carry a grown woman. Luckily, unlike what you thought everyone was thinking, most saw a young couple messing around instead.

Regardless of perception, you are only worried about your mother and eventually, you reach the cabin. Unlocking the compact door, you reach a single bedded room. Of course, it's because Mihoko was insistent on sharing a bed. Seeing that the cost was also low and you've been forced to sleep with her anyways at home, you agreed.

Placing her on the bed, Mihoko groans and the soft feeling of the bed makes her feel drowsy, much to your relief. Before you could leave though, Mihoko grabs your wrist and then smiles warmly.

"Eheh...stay with mommy please?"

You widen your eyes and even drunk, you find your mother incredibly cute. Still...you realize you need to keep a closer eye on her. This incident only proved that your mother is still recovering and at best, there's many things she isn't aware of thanks to her incomplete memories.

What do you do?
111112.title: Tipsy Mihoko

1111121.content:
You sigh, allowing yourself to be guided by your tipsy mother into napping with her. Although admittedly, you realize that the bed is pretty small for two people and Mihoko is only wearing a bikini which is probably a little small for her.

No, let's not mince words here. It IS small. Adding to how close she'll be, you realize that this arrangement is actually a bigger problem than you realize. Sleeping with your mother at home provided enough space so that you weren't touching her. That wasn't going to be possible in this case.

Gulping, you find that you cannot pull away and hurt your mother's feelings, even if she is drunk. As a precaution, you slowly slide next to her but refused to face her, letting your mother cling to your back again. You shiver at the touch of her huge chest smooshing against your back.

"Ikku-kun!" she groans, her eyes softening sadly as she stares at the back of your head, "...this is no good. Let mommy see you, okay?"

'Shit...' you think, hoping that your mother would just be content with clinging to you from your backside until she fell asleep. It would allow you to escape more easily too.

Not wanting to disappoint your mother, you bear with the funny feeling you had within your summer shorts.

Actually...once again, let's not mince words. As much as you didn't want to admit it, you got pretty hard carrying your mother on your back earlier. The worst thing you wanted is for your mother to feel a third leg poking her.

'I should really leave, but...' you think, trying to resolve yourself to leave for her own safety, but find yourself unable to go against her wishes. Are you simply sensitive to her since she's still recovering? No...your whole goal in life is to ease your mother's burden and make her happy. Drunk or not, you decide you need to at least let her rest peacefully.

Shuffling your legs to hide your boner, you turn around to face your mother. She squeals in delight to see her son up so close and then nuzzles her head below your chin, then wrapping one arm around you to bring you in closer.

"Oh Ikku-kun...my son..."

Her chest is now pressing against your own and it feels damn good. In your mind though, you are constantly reminding yourself this is your mother, the person who raised you to be responsible and kind. You couldn't betray her like this, even if her behavior is unnatural!

"M-mommy, you are hugging me a little too tightly..." you warn.

Mihoko doesn't seem to hear as she giggles and continues to nuzzle her head, the scent of the sea and her hair mixing together to produce an even lovlier smell to your nose. Despite the urge to wrap your arms around her voluptuous frame, you forbid yourself and tighten your fists.

Finally, after a minute of restraint, she finally lifts her head to stare at you, her eyes about ready to close having taken in comforting warmth of her son in addition to the soft bed. Yet, there was an unnatural longing in her eyes that you couldn't make out. As she draws closer, her mind probably fully muddled, you start to pull away.

"M-mom, what are you-"

You aren't able to finish and leaning forward, she catches your lips with hers, humming softly and then holding as long as she could. To your horror, you feel her raise a leg over you and wiggle her bottom half closer to you, the absolutely last thing you need.

Pulling away quickly, no longer able to concern yourself with hurting her feelings, you break away from her kiss and move away, a little too fast actually, pushing yourself off the bed and fumbling onto the wooden floor.

"Ow..."

Rubbing your hip bone, you get up slowly and see your mother with her eyes clothes with a stupid, yet cute grin on her face, giggling uncontrollably in her sleep and whispering your name. You aren't sure what to make of this, but you want to believe that the kiss wasn't intentional. Hell, it couldn't be considering how drunk she is. For how little alchohol she drank in that coctail, you fear to think what would happen if she accidentally drinks any more.

You gulp at that thought but for now, it seems that she is no longer present in the real world as she mumbles in her sleep, acting as if you were still in her arms. You blush as you feel her soft lips linger on your lips and you stare at your mother for a long time.

A dangerous thought occurs to you, part of a hidden desire that you deeply didn't want to admit. Right now, you could go back and snuggle closer to her. What would happen? You are almost certain that she would entrap you based on how her arms are subconsciously looking to grab onto you.

What do you do?

It is certainly wrong to take advantage of your mother, especially with most of her memories locked up, she's in her most innocent state right now. On top of that, she's drunk on what little alcohol she consumed.

Yet, the feeling of being immersed by her was good, even if you didn't want to admit it. Her kiss, the way she held you tightly, and how she smashed her huge mammaries against your chest.

You whisper your confession, not as a loving son, but as a man who is responding to such a gorgeous young woman. You dared not say it so affectionately while she is awake, so this was your only opportunity until the effects of the cocktail wear out.

Mihoko hum, as if acknowledging your love and snuggles her head deeper into her pillow, a very happy grin plastered on her face. Just as this sort of mother and son snuggle would be enough though, you feel her leg once again try to entrap your hips, pulling your lower half closer.

You bite your lips. Not once, but twice now your mother is trying to attempt something dangerous. Yet, feeling her warmth is so good, you don't want to leave so soon again. If you did, you may as well have not attempted to rejoin her in the bed.

Taking a deep breath, you let her draw you close until you find your crotch is now mashing against hers. You grunt, feeling her wriggle against you and let out a rather arousing moan.

'Oh god...this is...', you begin to think, but stop, not wanting to admit it. It's obvious though that now with the heat of your crotch transferring her own, she's slowly moving her hips and rubbing against you.

"Oh...Ikku-kun..."

...and saying your name so clearly on top of that.

You don't want to try to explain this off. Your mother...couldn't be thinking of you like this. Her body must be reacting differently from what she's dreaming about.

What do you do?

She has you entrapped in her smooth body, her legs locking you and one of her arms wrapped around her back. You face is buried in your mother's cleavage, jiggling pleasantly against your cheeks as she rubs off on you.

Even if you wanted to get out, your drunk mother made it hard to escape, but even so, you couldn't find the will to pull away anymore, allowing your mother to mumble and moan sweetly in her sleep. 111112111.title: Continue.

choices: Time skip: Arrival to the resort.
More events occur on the cruise ship.
1111121111.content:
A couple of days passed and they were almost there to the private resort island where they would enjoy themselves for another week. Until then, there was plenty to do on the cruise ship from eating, going to the spa, enjoying some light shows, and simply watching the ocean and occasional animal that sprouted out.

Mihoko had no recollection of her drunk stupor nor what she did in their cabin. You weren't planning on bringing it up at all, only telling her that she couldn't drink any alcohol. Still, the way she held on to you and pushed against you bled into your mind every night. It made you wary and scared...scared for your mother as you held feelings that shouldn't exist.

Some of those feelings came to fruition this night. Under the night sky, they watched various couples slowly dance to music on the main deck and Mihoko was the first to want to join in.

"Let's go Ikku, I think we can do a slow dance together," she chirped.

You are admittedly embarrassed by the idea, not just because you aren't sure if you want the attention, but also since the deck was for couples only. Mihoko could certainly pass for your girlfriend or even wife, but that also troubled you.

"Come on~"

You sigh, being led by your mother as she giggles. You try to avoid the sight of onlookers and enter the group of couples slowly twirling to the music. Blushing, you imitated what others were doing and reluctantly placed your hands around your mother's hips. Likewise, Mihoko placed her hands on your shoulders. Like this, you stared into your mother's eyes and move slowly around.

Seeing your slight embarrassment and complex expression, Mihoko cocked her head and furrowed her eyebrows out of concern.

"Sweetie, could it be your embarrassed to dance with me?"

"N-no, mom...I just...I guess I'm a little embarrassed, but that's just me. Nobody can tell that you're my mother," you admit, speaking quietly to avoid the ears around.

Mihoko took that as a compliment and smiled a little. "Thank you, sweetie. Still, I'm sure you'd rather have a girlfriend than me. I'm sorry about..."

"No," you stop her, rejecting the notion, "...mom, there isn't anyone I'd rather be with right now. I love you, mom."

Those words could be of familial affection, but for Mihoko, it made her heart leap regardless. Even though she knew that she shouldn't be seeing her son in that manner, she couldn't help it. With time, maybe her memories would make her less sensitive to affection with her son, but that also made her fear for the future. Would she ever be able to find love again? In her heart, you were the one who was always with her. She remembered you as a baby, but lacked the memories of you growing up so all she saw was a kind and loving man who had a claim to be her son.

"Oh...I...I love you too, sweetie," she replied with some hesitation, knowing that her words had a different meaning in her heart.

"Alright, you couples! We're about to end it here, so let's finish it off with a sweet kiss under the stars!" the announcer spoke, causing some shouts of encouragement and laughter to fill the main deck.

"Ah...er..."

You were now blushing heavily, not expecting this development. As you fumbled in your mind in how to avoid kissing your mother in front of everyone, Mihoko lifted her hands from her shoulder and surprised you by caressing your cheek.

"M-mom?"
